solution_line_template: After inflating the {new_balloons_total} new balloons, she will have {initial_red_balloons} red + {initial_blue_balloons} blue + {new_balloons_total} new = <<{initial_red_balloons}+{initial_blue_balloons}+{new_balloons_total}={total_balloons}>>{total_balloons} total balloons
The probability of selecting red will be ({initial_red_balloons} red + {new_red_balloons} red newly inflated) / {total_balloons} total balloons = {red_probability_percent}%
